raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Antibodies of the present invention can also be described or specified in terms of their binding affinity to a B7-related polypeptide of the present invention. Preferred binding affinities include those with a dissociation constant or Kd of less than 5×10<sup>−2 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−2 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−3 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−3 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−4 </sup>M, or 1×10<sup>−4 </sup>M.
More preferred binding affinities include those with a dissociation constant or Kd less than 5×10<sup>−5 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−5 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−6 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−6 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−7 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−7 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−3 </sup>M, or 1×10<sup>−8 </sup>M.
Even more preferred antibody binding affinities include those with a dissociation constant or Kd of less than 5×10<sup>−9 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−9 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−10 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−10 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−11 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−11 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−12 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−12 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−13 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−13 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−14 </sup>M, 1×10<sup>−14 </sup>M, 5×10<sup>−15 </sup>M, or 1×10<sup>−15 </sup>M.
In specific embodiments, antibodies of the invention bind to B7-related polypeptides of the invention, or fragments, or variants thereof, with an off rate (Koff) of less than or equal to about 5×10<sup>−2 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 1×10<sup>−2 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 5×10<sup>−3 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, or 1×10<sup>−3 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>.
More preferably, antibodies of the invention bind to B7-related polypeptides of the invention or fragments or variants thereof with an off rate (Koff) of less than or equal to about 5×10<sup>−4 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 1×10<sup>−4 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 5×10<sup>−5 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 1×10<sup>−5 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 5×10<sup>−6 </sup>sec<sup>1</sup>, 1×10<sup>−6 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 5×10<sup>−7 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, or 1×10<sup>−7 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>.
In other embodiments, antibodies of the invention bind to B7-related polypeptides of the invention or fragments or variants thereof with an on rate (Kon) of greater than or equal to 1×10<sup>3 </sup>M<sup>−1 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 5×10<sup>3 </sup>M<sup>−1 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, 1×10<sup>4 </sup>M<sup>−1 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>, or 5×10<sup>4 </sup>M<sup>−1 </sup>sec<sup>−1</sup>.
